title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Foliation Structure Learning Module for Understanding Geological Structures

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental geology terminology and knowledge of rock classification
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the formation process of foliation structures and metamorphic conditions with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can identify and correct commonly occurring foliation-related erroneous terminology in literature with over 75% accuracy.
Learners can describe a three-or-more-step procedure for creating geological maps using the relationship between bedding and foliation by analyzing virtual field cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
